resources.string: Sorry, this link doesn\'t seem to be working right now. Please try again later.
This business is no longer active on League
Welcome to our Health Rewards Program!
It’s time to select a program that best fits your health and wellness needs.
Based on the program you select, each day we’ll give you simple goals to help you develop healthy habits that improve your overall well-being.
Each completed activity gives you points you can redeem for League Credit usable in our online Marketplace.
You must agree to the terms and conditions to begin
Your account is active, and in the process of being set up.
Your account will be active on:
Program has ended. Ready to start a new one?
Start a new program to continue earning rewards for completing activities!
Having trouble finding the right program?
Get the answers and advice you need on health-related topics, including signs, symptoms and treatment options.\nThis chat is free, confidential and your privacy is protected.
We\'re sorry, there was an error loading your Health Programs. Please try again later.
Our Health Programs help you proactively reach your health goals and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
%1$d week program • %2$s • Earn up to %3$,d points
%1$d day program • %2$s • Earn up to %3$,d points

plurals.name: start_program_description_format_weeks
plurals.item: Are you ready to start the %1$s Health Program? We will send an activity each day for the next week to help you reach your goals!
Are you ready to start the %1$s Health Program? We will send an activity each day for the next %2$d weeks to help you reach your goals!

plurals.item: Are you ready to start the %1$s Health Program? We will send an activity to help you reach your goals!
Are you ready to start the %1$s Health Program? We will send an activity each day for the next %2$d days to help you reach your goals!

If you do not complete your enrollment, your elections will not be saved and you’ll have to restart.
Once you submit, you\'ll be able to add your dependent to your Health Spending Account. This change will take effect immediately and no further action is required on your end.

I understand this dependent will only be covered on my Health Spending Account. I certify that the information I provided is accurate and is subject to final approval. It won’t take long to build a full picture of your health.
Finish up to get personalized insights and content to support your health journey—plus %,d reward points.
Once you submit, answers can’t be changed.
They form your baseline health profile and help give us a clearer picture of your health by benchmarking your progress over time.
Based on your responses, we’ve created some recommended areas of focus to help prioritize and set your personal health goals.
We\'re sorry, there was an error submitting your health profile. Please try again.
Welcome. Let’s start building your Health Profile.
We’ll cover six areas of health to help you understand your needs and define your goals. Each area has 5–7 questions.
Complete activities to reach your health goals. Recommended based on your Health Profile.

We\'re sorry, there was an error loading your health journey
Have any questions about today\'s activity?
Health programs are broken down into daily or weekly activities that will help you get closer to your health goals.
Yes, I plan on going into work
No, I\'m not going into work today
Are you planning on going into work today?
If so, you’ll need answer a few questions about symptoms, travel, and contact you’ve had with others before entering the workplace.
If you do begin to experience any sudden symptoms, we strongly recommend checking back in with us to complete the daily health assessment.
Review your last responses for a faster check-in
Learn more in our Privacy Policy
Your responses are safe with us. Your participation status will be shared with your employer but individual responses will not be shared without consent.
By continuing, you agree to the <font color=\'#%1$s\'>Terms of service</font> and <font color=\'#%1$s\'>Privacy policy</font> that League will not be liable for any harm.
We\'re sorry, there was an error loading the privacy policy. Please try again.
Share my cleared-for-workplace status with the designated HR contact.
We\'re sorry, there was an error loading your Daily Health Assessment results, please try again
See what information will be shared
Exit, do not share my status
If you choose not to share your assessment status you will not be cleared to enter the workplace. If you have any questions, reach out to your manager.
To speed things up, you can submit the same responses as last time or you can start over to retake the assessment.
See what information will be shared
Before you’re able to return, you’ll need to share your cleared-for-workplace status with a designated contact from your HR team.
Before you’re able to return, you’ll need to share your cleared-for-workplace status with a designated contact from your HR team.
Can we share your cleared-for-workplace status with a designated contact from your HR team?
Can we share your cleared for workplace status?

Your status, indicating whether you can go into workplace today or whether you have tested positive for COVID-19, and whether you’ve complete today’s assessment will be shared with a designated person from your HR team.
Your individual health conditions or responses to previous questions will not be shared.
Learn more in our Privacy Policy
Based on your employer’s policy, it looks like you can be cleared to enter the workplace today.
Based on your employer’s policy, it looks like you will not be cleared to enter the workplace today.
If nothing has changed, it looks like you can be cleared to enter the workplace today.
If nothing has changed, it looks like you will not be cleared to enter the workplace today.

Get answers, advice and support in real time.
Chat with our care team who will listen, answer your questions, and connect you with resources to help you cope. It’s free and totally confidential.

When do you plan on returning to work?
We’ll let your employer know and resume your daily reminders at this date. You can change or extend this date at any time.

resources.string: You’ll no longer see it in your journey
Have there been any recent changes in your health?
Your Health Profile is now up-to-date.
Based on your updates, you may see some changes to your focus areas and list of featured Health Programs. This helps keep your app experience personalized just for you.
Learn more about our privacy policy and terms of conditions.
You haven\'t started any health programs

Apps and devices that are connected to your account will show up here.
You have granted these applications access to your health data.

This will prevent League from automatically syncing and using your health related data.
